Go Back Review Name: Worst experience ever! Review Description: One of the worst product and service. AC delivered on 31 Jan 2021 . Installation Charge claimed be by was around 5000 ( Includes outdoor unit ) . Since then it is continuously giving problems. Due to some leakage issues, it didn't work . So far we used the AC only 2 times and LG technical team is not able to fix the issues. So in a nutshell, LG team couldnt fix the cooling problem since 31 Jan 2021. Now AC is just a showpiece for me . Better go for some other brands .
